name: Donquixote Doflamingo
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
text: Blocker (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.) | On Play: Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck and return them to the top or bottom of the deck in any order.
